name: The CULTZONE Holy Grail
description: An Adventure that will investigate the whereabouts of the guardians of the Chalice of Christ in the Lands of Scotland. Embark on this challenge by sea, land and air, finding sacred relics, helping villagers and discovering quests, hunting monsters and gaining appreciation from beautiful damsels in distress! Show all your bravery in this game where only the honorable will reach the end!
